content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Sharma

Written by Saiwyn Quadras. Sanyuktha Chawla Shaikh. Abhishek Sharma

Cast John Abraham (Capt. Ashwat Rana). Boman Irani (Himanshu Shukla). Diana Penty (Capt. Ambalika). Anuja Sathe (Sushma). Vikas Kumar (Major Prem Singh). Yogendra Tikku (Dr. Naresh Sinha). Aditya Hitkari (Dr. Viraf Wadia). Ajay Shankar (Puru Ranganathan). Darshan Pandya (Pakistani spy). Mark Bennington (Daniel). Anil Rastogi (Sushma’s Father). Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande (Sushma’s Mother). Arush Nand (Prahlad). Bhupesh Pandya (Tripathi). Mohit K. Mehta (Chief Security Officer). Rohan Khatri (Sardaar Driver). Harish Khandal (Reporter). Satinder Singh Gahlot (Suresh Yadav). Nishikant Dixit (Officer in PM House). Zachary Coffin (CIA Officer Stephen). Shyam Bhagat. Tan Raj Ghale. Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Mudassar Khan. Jackey Mishra (Army). Munna. Nitesh Nath. Vikash Rajput ((voice)). Satkeer (Satish Rajasthani). Abhiroy Singh. Bhairao Singh

Language Hindi

Producers John Abraham. Manoj Jadhav. Hetvi Karia. Nasir Khan. Yogendra Mogre. Yogiraj Shetty. Navmeet Singh. Dharam Soni. Hitesh Thakkar. Mayank Tiwari

Production J.A. Entertainment. Kyta Production. NNB Digital Media
